channel.title: Source Help [Rep++ for all who help]
channel.description:
I am looking for, the best pking source there is.... but not any sources PI+ please, so mostly 317. i want the source to have a good pking point shop, and it needs to be a source that has been used by a once popular server. i am not looking to leach the source, i am looking to edit and use it, i will give credits if re-released, i am looking for a good source to edit to show my friends and have fun pking and training! please reply with a source link, i am looking forward to doing this.. (i am portforwarded)
**REMEMBER REP++ FOR ALL WHO TRY TO HELP**
